title: Make believe marriage
creator_contributor_role: Learning Corporation of America, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Experimental methods
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Marriage
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Role playing
description: Episode of Series "Learning to be human". Follows the progress of a group of senior high school students who undertake a marriage course lasting one semester. After being arbitrarily assigned a marriage partner, the couples are required to work out a suitable budget, undertake shopping trips to price basic items and generally come to terms with differing likes and dislikes. Each "family" must also meet a crisis: a baby, a loss of job, or a prison term for theft. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
